channel.title: Making server?
channel.description: well....i follow MOD_TA's post how to make a server .... but .. when i download the stuff im getting stuck at 4) run.bat. =( i cant help you but....there should be a new way to make a server ....hey MOD_TA if you read this... make a way i and other people can understand the way you tell other people???? can u make simple and not unsimple way of making a server...?? [glow=red,2,300]plz help me make 1[/glow] :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:
